reviewtext: After spending hours trying to decide what to buy, I bought the Palm IIIc because I wanted color (who watches b/w tv?), Palm has been around now for a few years, there are 100's of programs to download for it and auctions like Ebay have 100's of listings for software, hardware addons, etc.. I've had it for a few months now which I use for work (I'm an RN) and have had no problems with it. There are alot of programs for use in the medical field (alot free).
summary: My First PDA and It's Great.
